@wp.kernel
def rand_expr_vhmlrn(data: wp.array(dtype=float)):
    tid = wp.tid()
    v0 = data[tid]
    v1 = 0.0
    v2 = 1.0
    tmp = 0.0
    tmp = (((tmp + 0.02 - tmp + 0.06) * wp.cos(v1 + 0.96)) * wp.abs(v2))
    v2 = (tmp * wp.cos((v0 + 0.02 - v1 + 0.63)))
    v2 = 0.97
    data[tid] = v0
